about_the_game:
We are proud to introduce a new set of truck tyres and truck accessories, officially licensed from Goodyear to Euro Truck Simulator 2.

Goodyear is one of the world’s largest tyre companies and well known for its premium brand. For over 120 years Goodyear has pushed the envelope with new innovations in tyres and 'beyond tyres' setting the standard in the industry. Building on over 120 years of innovation, Goodyear just launched a full advanced range of on-road truck tyres. With the latest technologies on-board, the new KMAX GEN-2 and FUELMAX GEN-2 tyres deliver enhanced mileage and fuel-efficiency performance, while being able to cope with all kinds of weather conditions.

Front Tyres


  • 315/70 Goodyear FUELMAX S GEN-2
  • 315/70 Goodyear KMAX S GEN-2
  • 315/80 Goodyear KMAX S GEN-2

Rear Tyres


  • 315/70 Goodyear FUELMAX D GEN-2
  • 315/70 Goodyear KMAX D GEN-2

Paint Jobs


  • Goodyear Origins
  • Goodyear Dash

Cabin Accessories


  • Goodyear Packable Duffel
  • Wingfoot Air Freshener
  • Goodyear Blimp Model
  • Goodyear Cap
  • Goodyear Mug
  • Goodyear Notebook
  • Goodyear Wallet
  • Goodyear Mints
  • Goodyear Money Box
  • Goodyear Pillow
  • Goodyear Weekend Bag
detailed_description:
Meanwhile on the other side of the pond

Like what you see? Then check out the Goodyear Tires Pack for American Truck Simulator!


About the Game

We are proud to introduce a new set of truck tyres and truck accessories, officially licensed from Goodyear to Euro Truck Simulator 2.

Goodyear is one of the world’s largest tyre companies and well known for its premium brand. For over 120 years Goodyear has pushed the envelope with new innovations in tyres and 'beyond tyres' setting the standard in the industry. Building on over 120 years of innovation, Goodyear just launched a full advanced range of on-road truck tyres. With the latest technologies on-board, the new KMAX GEN-2 and FUELMAX GEN-2 tyres deliver enhanced mileage and fuel-efficiency performance, while being able to cope with all kinds of weather conditions.

Front Tyres


  • 315/70 Goodyear FUELMAX S GEN-2
  • 315/70 Goodyear KMAX S GEN-2
  • 315/80 Goodyear KMAX S GEN-2

Rear Tyres


  • 315/70 Goodyear FUELMAX D GEN-2
  • 315/70 Goodyear KMAX D GEN-2

  • Goodyear Origins
  • Goodyear Dash

  • Goodyear Packable Duffel

  • Goodyear Cap

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 30 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 30 MB available space
